#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int gcd(int a,int b)
{
    int c;
    if(b==0)
        return a;
    else
        while (b!= 0 )
        {
            c=b;
            b=a%b;
            a=c;
        }
    return a;
}
int main()
{
    int t,a,n,m;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
        a=gcd(n-1,m-1);
        printf("%d\n",a+1);
    }
    return 0;
}
